alert.note: Alert for Grenada; Leflore (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 12 at 4:51PM CDT until October 12 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL GRENADA AND NORTHWESTERN LEFLORE COUNTIES... At 451 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Minter City, or 13 miles east of Drew, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Grenada and northwestern Leflore Counties. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
